name: Ultra Minesweeper
description:
Clean the board without hitting a mine ! What is Ultra Minesweeper ?

Ultra Minesweeper is a remake of the famous Minesweeper game that was available on Windows XP & PDA devices.

Ultra Minesweeper is a puzzle game with reflexion and intuition. 

What are the rules ? 

Destroy all the blocks that didn't wear a bomb. When you click on a block, a number may appears : it shows how many bombs are in surrounding blocks. You can put a flag on a block by right clicking on it to highlight a potential mine location. But watch out, there is as many flags than mines.

How do i play it ?
  • Destroy a block : Mouse left button
  • Tag a block : Mouse right button
  • Enable/ Disable fullscreen : F key

Minimal Requirements :

  • Dual core processor
  • Intel HD Graphics
  • 2 Gb of RAM
Available on Windows & MacOS
